definition: way of looking at a thing/view/opinion/CL:個|个[ge4]
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The first step is to understand that self-esteem is your opinion of yourself.
sentences.chinese: 第一步是要理解自尊是你对你自己的看法。

sentences.english: Zhiwu Chen, a professor of finance at Yale, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 耶鲁大学的金融学教授陈志武也赞同这一看法。

sentences.english: Jack has rather jaundiced opinions about all these modern ideas.
sentences.chinese: 杰克对所有这些现代观念都抱有相当偏颇的看法。

sentences.english: Since I left I have probably changed my view.
sentences.chinese: 当我离开曼联后，我的看法或许已经改变了。

sentences.english: What did he think was going on?
sentences.chinese: 他对时局演变的看法为何？

sentences.english: Do you know what the New Englanders thought of this?
sentences.chinese: 您知道新英格兰居民对此案的看法吗？

sentences.english: Fu Tiezheng have also expressed similar views.
sentences.chinese: 傅铁铮对此也表达了类似的看法。

sentences.english: You should try to acquaint yourself with the facts, before you express an opinion.
sentences.chinese: 在发表看法前，你应该先了解事实真相。

sentences.english: I do not think the relevant fragments bear out this view.
sentences.chinese: 我并不以为有关的断简残篇能支持这种看法。

sentences.english: All of these issues will be on the agenda tomorrow when I meet with President Hu.
sentences.chinese: 我明天与胡主席会晤时，会就上述所有问题交换看法。

sentences.english: WANT to set down some general remarks about tramps .
sentences.chinese: 就流浪汉问题，我想谈几点粗略的看法。

sentences.english: I bet Sean Avery has an opinion on this..
sentences.chinese: 我打赌肖恩艾弗里对这件事会有看法。

sentences.english: First, is who you are or what you do that matters with respect to public perception?
sentences.chinese: 第一，公众的看法对于你是谁或你怎么做很重要吗？

sentences.english: In my choice, the medical profession is the most suitable.
sentences.chinese: 依我的看法，从医最合适。

sentences.english: I am sure my opinion is both sound and well-grounded.
sentences.chinese: 我可以肯定我的看法既合情合理又有凭有据。

sentences.english: What is Stolypin's attitude toward the mir ?
sentences.chinese: 斯托雷平对农村共产组织的看法是什么？

definition: way of thinking/opinion/notion/to think of a way (to do sth)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
to approve of/to endorse/(vote) in favor
to approve of/to endorse/(vote) in favor
